Features.title: Save Time
Features.text: Book appointments and manage schedules without long wait times.

Features.title: Safe & Secure
Features.text: Protects user data and transactions with advanced security measures.

Features.title: Go Digital
Features.text: Schedule vet check-ups, grooming, and pet services in just a few clicks.

Features.title: Business Insights
Features.text: Get data on appointment trends, popular services, and ratings.
